content:encoded:
This week’s hour of Case Closed begins with Mr. District Attorney, and his story from May 5, 1948, The Case Of The Sinister Cinema.

(30:18) Our last story is The Sinister Lighthouse, from This Is Your FBI. That episode originally aired June 7, 1946.

Download CaseClosed807

Your support keeps Case Closed coming every week. If you’d like to help, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you.
